name: SandBoxMaker1000
description:
Create your own country one by one starting from rocks and water to animals and humans.

Controls:

M for object menu.

WASD for moving.

Left Mouse Button for placing blocks,

Please,be part of the development of this project by reporting bugs and tell us what you think at:

ObnoxStudios@gmail.com

Warning!

Java 7+ needed for running the project
